summary: Wilderness Refuge is a small interior shack located in the wilderness, perched on a cliff for a fantastic view of Skyrims world. It\'s great for low/high level\'d characters looking to get away for a while and breath in that fresh virtual air.
descriptionHtml:
Wilderness Refuge is a small interior shack located in the wilderness, perched on a cliff for a fantastic view of Skyrim\'s world. It\'s great for low/high level\'d characters looking to get away for a while and breath in that fresh virtual air!

[center][IMG]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss242/Death811/2013-09-24_00004_zps497bfb1f.jpg[/IMG][/center] 

=Update Info=
Like all of my previous abodes. I\'ll be going through constant fixes and changes. I\'m always open to suggestions. So don\'t be scared to comment ;)

1.2-Fixes some floating trees around the shack as well as adds a little more detail to the shacks outside, not very noticeable. Removes skull and adds Shrine of Arkay as well as changes potion shelf.
 
1.1-Adds a few fixes as well as adding a Potion Shelf, Wood pile, and food sack. Nothing major.

What does this abode offer the player? 

Bed
Plenty of safe storage
Tanning Rack
Alchemy Table
Cooking Pot
Wood Choppers Block
Weapon Plaque
Weapon Rack
Shrine of Arkay

-Thanks&Credits-

P210- Giving advice and helpful feedback.
author: BillNyeTheScienceGuy
